Unexplained death in Ellerslie: Police search for woman, appeal for sightings of blue Kia Rio after man found in home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-appeal-for-sightings-of-a-blue-kia-rio-after-man-found-dead-in-an-ellerslie-home/JSPJPLC3MNDQFNDLRWPJUBNCZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-appeal-for-sightings-of-a-blue-kia-rio-after-man-found-dead-in-an-ellerslie-home/JSPJPLC3MNDQFNDLRWPJUBNCZM/ The vehicle is a blue Kia Rio, registration NJN927. Tue, 07 Nov 2023 00:48:25 +0000 Detective Inspector Scott Beard, left, talking to other officers at the scene of a home in Celtic Cr, Ellerslie, where a man was found dead on Monday night. New Zealand Herald photograph by Corey Fleming
